Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Can attempt to draw two students with some representation of a string-like element between them. (might be an unclear or roughly drawn line)
CANNOT: Cannot clearly convey the concept of using sound to relay information through the string. (may not understand sound transmission)
Cannot accurately depict the purpose of a string telephone over long distances. (may think it's just a toy)
Cannot demonstrate or illustrate functional elements of a string telephone, such as making sure the string is taut between cups. (may miss or misunderstand this requirement)
Cannot show, through the drawing, that the device can send or receive information over a given distance. (lacks understanding of communication over distance)
Might incorrectly depict the materials, adding elements not related to a string telephone or missing key components like cups. (may include extraneous materials or omit crucial ones)
